comment.text: This translation key is used to display the text "Late payment" in a specific UI element, likely as part of an alert or notification on a tariff page when a late payment grace period has expired. The label appears on a red background, indicating its urgent nature. It is intended for use by enterprise users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Վերջին վճարումը" translates to 'Last payment', which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Late payment'.  'Late payment' implies a payment made after the due date, while 'Last payment' simply refers to the most recent payment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like 'Հետաժամանակվա վճարում' (Hetažamankva včarum) which means 'Late payment', or 'Ուշացած վճարում' (Ušacac včarum) which also means 'Late payment'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While '延滞料' (Enkai ryou) literally translates to 'late payment fee' or 'delay fee', it doesn't precisely convey the meaning of just 'Late payment'. It implies a fee associated with the late payment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '遅延の支払い' (Chien no shiharai) for 'Late payment' if a general term is needed, or adjust the English context to reflect the fee associated with late payment.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: '마지막 지불' is a literal translation of 'last payment' and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'late payment'. 'Late payment' implies a payment received after the due date.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 연체료 (yeoncheryo) or 지연된 지불 (jiyeon doen jibul) would be more accurate translations for 'late payment'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ප්‍රමාද ගෙවීම" (pramaada gevima) literally translates to 'delayed payment,' it isn't the most natural or commonly used term for 'late payment' in Sinhala. A more suitable translation would be 'වරදායක ගෙවීම' (waradaayaka gevima) or 'දිර්ඝ කාලීන ගෙවීම' (dirgha kaaleena gevima).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: වරදායක ගෙවීම (waradaayaka gevima) or දිර්ඝ කාලීන ගෙවීම (dirgha kaaleena gevima)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation "Касна уплата" is not an accurate translation of "Late payment". "Касна" translates to "late" or "penalty", but "уплата" means "payment" or "deposit." A more accurate translation would be something like "Закашњела уплата" or "Прикасно уплате".
